questions.question: What item is being produced in this line?
Do approved work instructions exist for the item being produced?
Is line staffing no more than work instruction allocation?
Is all required special equipment or material present?
Are all required gaylords present and being used for their assigned waste?
Is breakdown performing all required tasks in work instruction approved sequence?
Is testing performing all required tasks in work instruction approved sequence?
Is cleaning performing all required tasks in work instruction approved sequence?
Is packing performing all required tasks in work instruction approved sequence?
Does QC have approved quality standard available for item being produced?
